CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing New Users relative to Premium Users?
SRP.A: New Users is {above} Premium Users in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total user engagement rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Premium Users}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total user engagement rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Desktop Users}.

VE.Q: What is New Users's User Engagement Rate in 1984?
VE.A: New Users's user engagement rate in 1984 is {17.49} %.

VE.Q: What is New Users's User Engagement Rate in 1988?
VE.A: New Users's user engagement rate in 1988 is {27.41} %.

VE.Q: What is New Users's User Engagement Rate in 1991?
VE.A: New Users's user engagement rate in 1991 is {24.02} %.

VE.Q: What are the user engagement rate of Desktop Users, Premium Users, and New Users in 1989?
VE.A: Desktop Users's user engagement rate is {21.60} %, Premium Users's user engagement rate is {27.09} %, New Users's user engagement rate is {25.71} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum User Engagement Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum user engagement rate is {14.19} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum User Engagement Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum user engagement rate is {35.68} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest User Engagement Rate level recorded for Desktop Users?
What is the lowest User Engagement Rate level recorded for Desktop Users?
EVJ.A: Desktop Users's lowest recorded level is approximately {14.19} % in {1993}.

SC.Q: What is the average total User Engagement Rate?
SC.A: The average total user engagement rate is {74.86} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total User Engagement Rate fall between 71.97 and 79.54 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total User Engagement Rate exceed 79.75 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total User Engagement Rate go below 71.76 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1990 and 1992, was the average total User Engagement Rate higher or lower than between 1984 and 1988?
NC.A: The average total user engagement rate between 1990 and 1992 was {higher} than between 1984 and 1988.

NC.Q: Between 1987 and 1989, was the average total User Engagement Rate higher or lower than between 1986 and 1990?
NC.A: The average total user engagement rate between 1987 and 1989 was {lower} than between 1986 and 1990.

NC.Q: Between 1986 and 1989, was the average total User Engagement Rate higher or lower than between 1986 and 1991?
NC.A: The average total user engagement rate between 1986 and 1989 was {lower} than between 1986 and 1991.

NC.Q: Was the total User Engagement Rate in 1987 higher or lower than in 1993?
NC.A: The total user engagement rate in 1987 was {lower} than in 1993.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Premium Users} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Desktop Users, New Users, Premium Users}.
